availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Cooper (Lincoln County, Kentucky, state rep and county attorney)

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, attorney, county attorney, and politician. Lincoln County, Kentucky, native. Married to Pauline Karr Cooper in Madison County, Kentucky, on November 12, 1861. Father of Lucy A. Cooper and Fannie P. Cooper. Attorney in Lincoln County in 1860. County attorney for Lincoln County from 1861 to 1862. Member of the House of Representatives for the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Lincoln County from 1861 to 1863.
